title: tft mobile
body: just wanting to know if tft mobile will be coming out this January

replies.body:
Probably not January, but you can expect it _before_ [May 31st 2020](https://www.dailyesports.gg/teamfight-tactics-mobile-to-be-released-before-may-2020/)

Be sure to be [signed up for the updates](https://teamfighttactics.leagueoflegends.com/en-au/?app=tft&source=google&campaign_name=L10&campaign_id=6946185005&keyword=tft%20mobile&gclid=CjwKCAiAjMHwBRAVEiwAzdLWGDl7Jr52CTwptMbAmwFyxK7TFiSpTLUbrE_kg0V2Fikb7B6TfcEbJhoC6TAQAvD_BwE)!
